price: Watasema: Tuna nini hata hatuwaoni wale watu ambao tukiwahisabu ndio katika waovu?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ
footnotes: Na watu wa Motoni watasema: Mbona hatuwaoni wale watu ambao tulikuwa duniani tukiwahisabu kuwa ndio katika waovu, na wa duni, wasio kuwa na jema lolote? Na watu hao ni wale mafakiri wa Kiislamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā naʿudduhum mina al-ashrāri
